unnormalised: ## Flash Sales: Grab 'em Before They're Gone!
normalised: ## Flash Sales: Grab them Before They're Gone!

unnormalised: Hey folks, ever felt that adrenaline rush when you stumble upon a mind-blowing deal that seems too good to be true? Chances are, you've encountered the magic of a flash sale! In the cutthroat world of retail and e-commerce, flash sales are like that delicious plate of biryani your mom makes only during Eid - rare, intensely flavorful, and something you *absolutely* don't want to miss.
normalised: Hey folks, ever felt that adrenaline rush when you stumble upon a mind-blowing deal that seems too good to be true? Chances are, you've encountered the magic of a flash sale! In the cutthroat world of retail and e-commerce, flash sales are like that delicious plate of biryani your mom makes only during Eid - rare, intensely flavorful, and something you *absolutely* don't want to miss.

unnormalised: What exactly *is* a flash sale? Simply put, it's a limited-time offer on a specific product or range of products. We're talking discounts that can sometimes hit a whopping 70%, 80%, even 90%! Think Diwali season on steroids. These sales usually last for a very short period – sometimes just a few hours, other times maybe a day or two.

unnormalised: Why do companies like Myntra or Ajio run these things? Well, several reasons! Firstly, it's a fantastic way to clear out old stock and make way for new inventory. Remember that saree from last Onam that just didn’t quite sell? Flash sale material! Secondly, flash sales create a sense of urgency. That ticking clock forces customers like you and me to make quick decisions. No time to procrastinate, just pure, unadulterated shopping!

unnormalised: Imagine, you've been eyeing that new OnePlus phone for ages, but the Rs. 35,000 price tag has been holding you back. Suddenly, a flash sale drops the price to Rs. 28,000 for just 4 hours! Are you going to wait? Absolutely not! You’re hitting that "Add to Cart" button faster than you can say “Mumbai local.”

unnormalised: But, here's a pro tip from your friendly neighborhood blogger: Don't get swept away by the hype. Do your research, compare prices, and make sure you're actually getting a good deal. Just because it's a "flash sale" doesn't automatically mean it's the best price you'll find. Sometimes, you might find similar deals on other platforms.
